title: Why I created this template
description: I always wanted to create things that come to my mind. A while ago, Framer made a lot of things possible, sparking my curiosity. And so I began.
author: Romio

title: Supported styles
description: This documentation covers the supported Markdown styles and tags for this project. Use this as a quick reference to format your content effectively.
author: Romio

title: Blogspot template doc
description: This documentation explains how to set up the Blogspot template for the first time and then use it seamlessly afterward to create your personal blog.
author: Romio

title: Markdown and HTML: History, "evolution", and 'current' state
description: Explore the detailed histories, key milestones, and current states of Markdown and HTML. Discover their origins, evolution, and significance in web development.
author: Romio

title: Why blog?
description: A personal perspective on how blogging offers more freedom and control than social media and why sharing your ideas and experiences in your own space matters.
author: Romio
